name: Fizik M6B Cycling Shoes - Unisex
description: Ride cross-country with a shoe built for the job. Upper is mesh for flexilibility and ventilation. Boa L5 Bridge closure system allows incremental adjustments so you can get your best fit. Contoured footbed and supportive heel keep your foot in place for efficient foot-to-pedal energy transfer. Carbon-reinforced midsole plus rubber outsole give you a stiff base for power, grip, and all-terrain protection.Breathable Nylon mesh upper with synthetic leather overlays.Boa L5 Bridge closure for quick and easy fit adjustment.Hook-and-loop straps secure the forefoot.Supportive cycling-specific insoles.Carbon-reinforced nylon midsole for efficient power transfer.Rubber outsole provides durable traction.
